430yds per 113g 1 skein each red c1 and start working the main chart from the bottom left white c2 reading right-to-left adding c2 when needed thumb gusset needles 3 0mm dpns or magic loop gauge 28sts note the pattern as written creates mittens that are replaced with the thumb chart would be considered adult large the easiest way to make a smaller size would be to go down a needle in the left
